explanations_1: calc_job -- always write `dos`; fermi_level -- fermi energy of the system/eV
explanations_2: kmesh -- density of kpoints; max_iter -- calc parameter for pardiso diagonalization
explanations_3: num_bands -- number of bands for sparse diagonalization
explanations_4: emin/emax -- min/max energy for dos calculation (eV, relative to fermi_level)
explanations_5: edense -- number of energy points for dos calculation
explanations_6: smearing -- Gaussian smearing for dos calculation/eV
explanations_7: BE AWARE OF CONVERGENCE RELATED TO KMESH AND SMEARING
